name: I Knew You People Were Behind This.
effect: [Main] You may rest 7 of your DON!! cards: If your Leader is [Perona], play up to 1 {Thriller Bark Pirates} type Character card with a cost of 6 or less and up to 1 {Thriller Bark Pirates} type Character card with a cost of 4 or less from your hand or trash. [Counter] Your Leader gains +3000 power during this battle.
